about_the_game:
The world is in danger and cries out for a hero who can save it. But that’s not our problem. Here, we just play tennis. Seriously, you’re insisting on a deep storyline in a tennis game? Well, let’s say your dream is to become the world’s greatest tennis player, and to achieve that, you’ll need to face the most skilled and bizarre opponents. But if you ask me why this includes defeating a giant sea monster, I’ll owe you an explanation.

In Quacolé Tennis, you’ll discover that there are no limits for those who want to become the best. From the depths of the sea to outer space, every place is perfect for tennis matches. Prove your worth on the most unusual courts in friendly matches for up to 4 players or beat all the challenges in the single-player and 2-player cooperative campaigns!

WEIRD CHARACTERS Dozens of characters to choose from, each one stranger than the other!

DANGERS ON THE COURT Be careful where you step. The path to becoming the best is filled with obstacles!

SPECIAL POWERS Surprise your opponents with special abilities. Each character has one, so be prepared for all kinds of crazy techniques.

Too lazy to read and just looking for a feature list? Here’s everything you’ll find in Quacolé Tennis:

  • 30 characters with unique attributes and powers

  • 10 different courts, each with its own obstacles and dangers

  • Local multiplayer for up to 4 players

  • 1v1 and 2v2 tennis matches (or 2v1 as well, life’s not fair, so why should this game be?)

  • Single Player and Co-op campaigns for 2 players

  • Boss battles (is this still a tennis game?)

Grab your racket and call your friends for the greatest adventure in the world of tennis!

name: Quacolé Tennis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32-Bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Face the most unexpected opponents in completely crazy tennis matches. Win tournaments, overcome obstacles, and defeat giant monsters using the power of your racket! Embark on a solo adventure or invite a friend to explore the world of Quacolé Tennis in doubles matches.
